Learning to read Welsh, one Tweet at a time...

Follow @tweetsinwelsh

27
Jul 2020

O yfory ymlaen, gall sinemâu ailagor.

Byddent yn gofyn i chi gwneud rhai pethau'n wahanol ac efallai na fydd rhai yn barod i'ch croesawu yn ôl eto, felly holwch cyn i chi ymweld.

Defnyddiwch fap @ICOtweets i ffeindio eich sinema annibynnol leol ⬇️https://t.co/nnG2x9lkkM pic.twitter.com/InES5VsEeW

— Llywodraeth Cymru (@LlywodraethCym) July 26, 2020

gofyn - ask

gwahanol - different

efallai - maybe

From tomorrow, cinemas can reopen. They will ask you to do some things differently and maybe some will not yet be ready to welcome you back, so ask before you visit. Use @ICOtweets map to find your local independent cinema.

26
Jul 2020

"Misoedd diwetha' 'ma wedi bod yn anodd ofnadwy"

Geiriau Jonathan Foskett, Cyfarwyddwr Gwasanaeth Bwyd yn Llanystumdwy, am y sefyllfa sy'n wynebu ei gwmni yn sgîl y coronafeirws. pic.twitter.com/TSTfcmWJw5

— Newyddion S4C (@NewyddionS4C) July 25, 2020

wynebu - face

sefyllfa - situation

anodd - difficult

"The last few months have been terribly difficult." Jonathan Foskett, Director of Food Service in Llanystumdwy, talks about the situation his company is facing as a result of the Coronavirus.

25
Jul 2020

Dych chi'n dysgu Cymraeg? Dych chi'n defnyddio eich Cymraeg tu fas i'r dosbarth? Neu dych chi'n nabod rhywun sy'n dysgu Cymraeg ac yn gwneud ymdrech i ddefnyddio'r Gymraeg? Beth am enwebu'r dysgwr ar gyfer y gystadleuaeth wych yma? https://t.co/wTJ094FSW8 @MenterCaerdydd pic.twitter.com/SjHEDn0SVZ

— Welsh for Adults (@LearnCymraegCF) July 2, 2020

tu fas i - outside

gwneud ymdrech - making an effort

cystadleuaeth - competition

Are you learning Welsh? Are you using your Welsh outside the class? Or do you know someone who is learning Welsh and is making an effort to use Welsh? What about nominating the learner for this great competition?

24
Jul 2020

Rydym yn falch o gefnogi holl Gwinllannoedd Cymru am eu gwaith caled ac edrychwn ymlaen at gyflenwi'ch gwin ledled Cymru i hyrwyddo Wythnos Gwin Cymru rhwng 27 Gorffennaf a 2 Awst.@welshwines #welshwineweek #wythnosgwincymru @Welsh_Wine_Week #winelover #Wales #cymru #yagym pic.twitter.com/OrcJ7Lv9Di

— Blas ar Fwyd (@blasarfwyd) July 22, 2020

rydym yn falch - we are proud

cyflenwi - supply

gwin - wine

We are proud to support all the Welsh vineyards for their hard work and looking forward to supplying your wine throughout Wales to promote Welsh Wine Week between 27 July and 2 August.

23
Jul 2020

YN FYW nawr yn y drafodaeth ar systemau bwyd #AdferiadGwyrddCymru. “Mae angen arweinyddiaeth drawsadrannol o'r llywodraeth yng Nghymru i ddylunio system fwyd sy’n darparu iechyd planedol a dynol” meddai @Shea_DJones. #rethinkingfoodcymru pic.twitter.com/pLmrhhENOJ

— WWF Cymru 🌏 (@WWFCymru) July 21, 2020

trafodaeth - discussion

llywodraeth - government

iechyd - health

Live now at the discussion on the food system '#greenrecoverywales'. "We need cross-departmental government leadership in Wales to design a food system that delivers planetary and human health" said @Shea_DJones '#rethinkingfoodcymru'

22
Jul 2020

Pnawn da! Yfory am 12pm mi fyddwn ni'n troi'r sbotolau creadigol at y sefydliad cymunedol @JUKEBOX_COLLECT - felly cadwch lygad ar ein Instgram lle byddwn ni'n rhannu eu stori, prosiectau cyffrous a meddyliau am y dyfodol ➡️✨ edrych ymlaen! https://t.co/lImLYZw7lL pic.twitter.com/Zuq9uZaMxK

— CaerdyddCreadigol | CreativeCardiff (@CreativeCardiff) July 21, 2020

cyffrous - exciting

troi - to turn

dyfodol - future

Good afternoon! Tomorrow at 12pm we will be turning the creative spotlight on the community foundation @JUKEBOX_COLLECT - so keep your eyes on our Instagram where we will share their story, exciting projects and thoughts about the future. Looking forward!
